meanings.definition: A chemical compound containing an ethylene oxide group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ethoxyl in the lab.

meanings.sent4: The ethoxyl stood out in the mixture like a bright star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of ethoxyl makes it easy to identify in a formula.
